parsed.title: Como um ícone de sangue libelo virou brinquedo infantil
parsed.summary: Um boneco de plástico reproduz a famosa gravura medieval que alimentou séculos de ódio. A imagem viaja das páginas impressas da Idade Média até fóruns online, alimentando discursos de intolerância. O vídeo revela, em poucos segundos, como um símbolo de injustiça histórica se transforma em mercadoria e arma de propaganda contemporânea, deixando a pergunta aberta: quem realmente controla a narrativa?

scenes.narration: Um menino santo virou brinquedo… e ninguém entende como isso aconteceu hoje.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a dusty toy store shelf illuminated by a single shaft of cold light, a plastic doll resembling a medieval child martyr stands prominently, shadows deepening around it, muted earth tones.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the plastic doll, subtle camera tilt up, dust motes drifting in cold light beam
scenes.audioDescription: Ambient store echo with distant footsteps, low hum of fluorescent lights

scenes.narration: Nas prateleiras, um boneco de plástico reproduz a pose da gravura medieval do século XV.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, close-up of the doll on a wooden shelf, the figure mimics the kneeling child from the 15th‑century woodcut, background blurred, faint candlelight glints on its surface.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle camera pan left across the shelf, plastic doll subtly rotating, faint light glimmering on its surface
scenes.audioDescription: Soft creak of shelf wood, distant murmurs of shoppers, subtle echo

scenes.narration: Esse mesmo ícone circula em fóruns ocultos, alimentando discursos de ódio contra judeus hoje.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a dimly lit computer screen shows the doll image shared in a clandestine online forum, neon green cursor flickers, background walls covered in shadowy graffiti.
scenes.motionDescription: Static close-up of screen, cursor flickering rapidly, subtle glow pulsing on the image
scenes.audioDescription: Low electronic hum, occasional keystroke clicks, distant echo of anonymous messages

scenes.narration: Um selo amarelo cintila por um instante, sinalizando a marca de exclusão.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a quick flash of a yellow badge appears on the doll, the symbol glows briefly before fading into darkness, surrounding shadows deepen.
scenes.motionDescription: Fast flash effect of yellow badge, then fade to black, subtle camera shake
scenes.audioDescription: Sharp metallic chime followed by a brief silence, then low ambient drone

scenes.narration: Um silêncio pesado encerra a história, deixando perguntas sem resposta para todos agora.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black screen fades in with the white logo 'The Gap Files' centered, faint vignette edges, no other elements.
scenes.motionDescription: Fade in of logo, subtle zoom in, lingering for a moment before cut
scenes.audioDescription: Silence, only faint heartbeat rhythm faintly audible

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
